text: @CNN Guaranteed upswing in cases, when Trump withholds enough Covid19 tests to safely isolate those that could spread the illness. Seeing beaches & restaurants full of people not social distancing or wearing masks, highlights the return of stupid behaviour too. 😷☮️❤️
